CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S
CALM WINDS

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S
CALM WINDS, BECOMING SOUTHWEST AROUND 5 MPH IN THE AFTERNOON

CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 40S
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH IN THE EVENING, BECOMING LIGHT AND VARIABLE
